trans-unit.source: Creates an array of handles to large or small icons extracted from a file

seg-source.mrk: Creates an array of handles to large or small icons extracted from a file

target.mrk: Creates an array of handles to large or small icons extracted from a file

trans-unit.source: Name of an executable file, DLL, or icon file from which icons will be extracted

seg-source.mrk: Name of an executable file, DLL, or icon file from which icons will be extracted

target.mrk: Name of an executable file, DLL, or icon file from which icons will be extracted

trans-unit.source: Specifies the 0-based index of the first icon to extract

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the 0-based index of the first icon to extract

target.mrk: Specifies the 0-based index of the first icon to extract

trans-unit.source: Pointer to an array of icon handles that receives handles to the large icons extracted from the file.

seg-source.mrk: Pointer to an array of icon handles that receives handles to the large icons extracted from the file.

target.mrk: Pointer to an array of icon handles that receives handles to the large icons extracted from the file.

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is 0, no large icons are extracted from the file.

seg-source.mrk: If this parameter is 0, no large icons are extracted from the file.

target.mrk: If this parameter is 0, no large icons are extracted from the file.

trans-unit.source: Pointer to an array of icon handles that receives handles to the small icons extracted from the file.

seg-source.mrk: Pointer to an array of icon handles that receives handles to the small icons extracted from the file.

target.mrk: Pointer to an array of icon handles that receives handles to the small icons extracted from the file.

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is 0, no small icons are extracted from the file.

seg-source.mrk: If this parameter is 0, no small icons are extracted from the file.

target.mrk: If this parameter is 0, no small icons are extracted from the file.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of icons to extract from the file

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the number of icons to extract from the file

target.mrk: Specifies the number of icons to extract from the file

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of icons contained in the specified file, when $iIndex is -1, $paLarge parameter is 0, and $paSmall is 0.

seg-source.mrk: Returns the number of icons contained in the specified file, when $iIndex is -1, $paLarge parameter is 0, and $paSmall is 0.

target.mrk: Returns the number of icons contained in the specified file, when $iIndex is -1, $paLarge parameter is 0, and $paSmall is 0.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the return value is the number of icons successfully extracted from the file.

seg-source.mrk: Otherwise, the return value is the number of icons successfully extracted from the file.

target.mrk: Otherwise, the return value is the number of icons successfully extracted from the file.
